prompt.text: Hi! I'm LabAssistant. Let us wait until both teammates have joined the discussion.

Part 1 - Mix A and B and use the species viewer to determine the stoichiometry of the reaction between A and B, including the stoichiometric coefficients. You will find 1 M solutions of each reagent in the stockroom. Talk it through, then each teammate type ready:part1 when prepared.
Compare notes before you lock in an answer. What observations or tests support your Part 1 reaction?

Great! Your Part 1 reaction is correct!.

We'll reveal the Part 1 solution and keep moving.
